product_name: Mountain House Pasta Primavera Vegetarian - 2 Servings
long_description: Instant, lacto-vegetarian pasta-and-vegetable dish in a creamy sauce. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Quick and filling meal for camping and backpacking; serves two. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents.
short_description: Instant, lacto-vegetarian pasta-and-vegetable dish in a creamy sauce.
